result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert C Lane

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on November 21, 2022 at 09:20 am.

Clerk: Micki
Case Called at: 8:21 a.m.
INCLUDES 22CF989 and 22CF1175.
 
State appears by ADA Hannah Runde for DDA Molly Lawrence; Defendant appears in person, in custody from the MCJ, with Attorney Nathan Oswald. 

Date and time set for hearing/bond forfeiture hearing/waiver of prelim.
*COURT quashes warrant* 

Defendant is currently on a probation hold. 

22CF989 and 22CF1175:
Waiver of Prelim. filed; COURT questions deft as to waiver.
COURT finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial. 
Information will be e-filed; Reading Waived; R/J. 
Plea >> NOT GUILTY. 

COURT ORDERS: Bond continues.

PTC w/JA - 11/21/22 at 9:20 a.m. (defendant is excused)

Adj: 8:26 a.m.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.   Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:03 p.m. 

State appears by ADA Alex Lech.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, with Atty Heather Roehr, in person.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Waived. 

COURT ORDERS: $1,500.00 signature bond. 

CONDITIONS: 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

DATES:
BFH: 10/24/22 @ 8:30 A.M.

Adjourned: 2:05 p.m.
